sub_title: Digital marketing consultant & Owner Webprofessor | Motivated by implementing IT solutions within business processes and departments
summary:
"Making IT solutions understandable within departments to make business processes more efficient and effective for the customer"

Eager to learn, entrepreneurial and a driven professional describe who I am. After college (graduated cum laude) I have deepened my knowledge by taking a master's degree Marketing Management at Tilburg University. Here I developed my interests in improving customer experiences and business processes by applying digital innovations. This interest translates to my role as Digital Marketing Consultant. Throughout my work I take care of the translation between Business and Marketing IT. I am focused on implementing (marketing) IT solutions within business processes and departments.

Because of these two main interests I aspire to a position such as Customer Experience Consultant, IT Consultant, Scrum Master or Business Analyst. 

Am I the person you are looking for or do you have any questions? Please contact me.

☎ 06 - 13933309

Een complete website laten maken? Wij zijn uw professor voor webdesing, zoekmachine optimalisatie en conversie optimalisatie.

projects.title: Helpi (start-up)
projects.description:
Dit project was gericht op het beginnen van een startup genaamd 'Helpi' 

"Helpi wil scholieren (6-24 jaar) stimuleren om elkaar te helpen met hun passie en kennis. Dit gebeurt door middel van een online platform, waarbij vraag een aanbod van scholieren bij elkaar komen."

Als projectleider van Helpi zorgde ik ervoor dat iedereen wist wat er gedaan moest worden om de deadlines te halen. Bovendien was ik het middelpunt in de communicatie tussen externe partijen en de startup. Hiernaast heb ik me verdiept in de conceptontwikkeling, finance en marktonderzoek.

projects.title: RTL Nederland (social media onderzoek)
projects.description:
Dit project was gericht op het houden van social media onderzoek en het bedenken van een second screen app. De second screen app heette RTL social en was bedacht om meer engagement te creëren. Ook hebben we een social media onderzoeksrapport gemaakt.
Met dit project heb ik geleerd hoe je projectmanagement toepast en wat social media voor invloed heeft op het televisie kijken.

Projectrol:
Met het project voor RTL Nederland ben ik aangewezen als projectleider. Hierbij zorgde ik ervoor dat het project volgens de planning werd uitgevoerd en was ik verantwoordelijk voor de visualisatie van het concept en het conceptboek.

projects.title: Sanoma (marktonderzoek)
projects.description:
Dit project was gericht op het doen van marktonderzoek (desk- en fieldresearch). We hebben een landelijke enquête uitgebracht om te onderzoeken wat het mediagebruik van jongeren was.

Projectrol:
Het Sanoma project was mijn eerste project van mijn studie. Hierbij heb ik desk- en fieldresearch gedaan en deze onderzoeksdata verwerkt in SPSS en geanalyseerd. Uitkomsten van de analyse hebben ik in de presentatie verwerkt en gevisualiseerd.

projects.title: L'Oréal Brandstorm 2018
projects.description: L'Oréal project waarbij een concept bedacht moest worden voor de 'salon experience of the future'. Hierbij hebben twee medestudenten en ik de 'Retrim' bedacht waardoor het mogelijk werd om goedkoop, gepersonaliseerd en snel een trimup te krijgen. Door een slimme tondeuze te ontwikkelen met een automatisch afstelbare trimkop, werd het mogelijk voor klanten om binnen 5 minuten bijgetrimd te worden. Dit concept had voordelen voor L'Oréal, de kapperszaak en de klant. Echter zijn we niet uitgekozen als beste concept.

contributors.headline: Digital marketing consultant & Owner Webprofessor | Motivated by implementing IT solutions within business processes and departments

projects.title: LiveWall (concepting)
projects.description:
Dit project was gericht op het creëren van een concept voor de iBeacon. De toepassing die we hebben bedacht, was om op festivals met de bezoekers te kunnen communiceren en te monitoren wat waar gebeurt. Ook kon er via de app en de iBeacons aan crowd management gedaan worden. 
Met dit project heb ik geleerd om een toepassing voor een project te bedenken (concepting) en te onderzoeken of er interesse is vanuit de doelgroep.

Projectrol:
Bij het project voor LiveWall ben ik als projectleider aangewezen. Hierdoor heb ik de taken die er gedaan moesten worden verdeeld en tussendoor bijgestuurd waar nodig. Ook heb ik een (animatie)video gemaakt, om het concept duidelijk te maken voor de opdrachtgever en verschillende experimenten uitgevoerd om het concept te testen.

profile_positions.description:
At CZ working as Requirements Engineer within the Software and Services (SenS) department in the Online Selfservice team. I make the translation between Business and IT. 

• Business requirements are translated and specified for the IT team in order to add the right value to the IT application.
• Creation of PBI's and managing refinement sessions
profile_positions.title: Requirements Engineer

profile_positions.description:
• Started my own company to gain practical experience in the field of marketing and web design. 
• Development of websites and webshops where SEO and conversion techniques are implemented in the website as standard. 
• Execution of search engine optimization (SEO) and company visualization (house style, logo, video). This through an online marketing strategy to develop how the visitor can best be approached and can navigate through the website.
profile_positions.title: Owner Webprofessor

profile_positions.description:
• After a migration to AEM Touch UI, strategically set up the corporate website using best practices within AEM. Goal is a scalable and flexible website for a consistent User Experience.
• Contact person between the business (customer) and IT for continuing development and optimization of the system. Continuing development by translating customer requirements into IT applications. Optimization by organizing and executing the product backlog.
• Developed quarterly publication process in which 5 stakeholder fields are managed.
• In addition, support for content implementation for all AkzoNobel brands.
profile_positions.title: Service Engineer DAS. Web / Digital Support Corporate Communications (hired via intoAction)

profile_positions.description:
Driving Digital Innovation, that's what intoAction is all about. With my role I help companies to innovate in the field of Digital Marketing and Strategy. 

- Working on behalf of intoAction at Signify (formerly Philips Lighting) in the DMS Web team & Marketing Automation team (temporarily)
- Working on behalf of intoAction at AkzoNobel as Digital Consultant in the Corporate Communications team and DAS. Web team
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Consultant / Business Engineer

profile_positions.description:
At Digital Marketing Support (DMS), we unburden the organisation (Signify) by organizing and executing all Signify's digital services and digital projects.


• In the DMS Web team, I take care of the digital activation of the Signify website worldwide. Also owner of the DMS Web backlog for internal system (AEM) optimizations via Agile sprints.
• In the DMS Email team I apply marketing automation to collect, inspire and activate leads worldwide.
• As a DMS Web expert I provide support to the Investor Relations & Corporate Communications team regarding digital activation and quarterly results publication.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Support Signify (hired via IntoAction)

profile_positions.description:
• During the parties responsible for a section of the buffet. I worked in groups where I had to supervise up to 3 people. 
• I learned to work in a customer-oriented way and to remain customer-friendly even under stressful environments. At the same time to remain communicatively strong both within and outside the team.
profile_positions.title: Party assistant & Kitchen help

profile_positions.description:
• Performed SEO, SEA and website optimization for different clients. Such as analyzing websites and creating SEO strategies to subsequently execute them. Result: Keywords with high search volumes (>6100) reappeared in the top 5.
• Project manager for some customers regarding the communication and reporting of the results achieved.
• Through the weekly task as a telephonist learned to help both satisfied and angry customers and where necessary to reassure.
profile_positions.title: Ecommerce marketer

profile_positions.description:
• Graduation thesis written about the expectations, risks and needs for purchasing a conversion optimization service (7,8). 
• Work performed in the areas of SEO, SEA, conversion optimization.
profile_positions.title: Graduation intern E-commerce marketer

profile_positions.description:
• Responsible for the opening and closing of the fish shop. Responsible for the purchase of fish, the preparation of fish dishes and the sale of fish dishes. 
• Responsible for training and managing personnel.
profile_positions.title: Seafood shop manager

profile_positions.description:
• SEO optimization tasks: Carried out the project "Iedere Dag de Beste Winkel (IDBW)" for datastorage products. This means that I managed my own (digital) store of which I was responsible for adding new products, improving search results and further activities related to SEO optimization. This brought important keywords back into the top 3 after an increase of 2 or 3 positions in the Google search results . 
• Data analysis and conversion optimization tasks: I took part in an innovation project in which I analyzed data (such as a return analysis, 'shopping basket analysis' and keyword analysis) and then made and implemented recommendations that improved the customer experience and profitability.
Examples of results: +€4,40 average order value after implementation of XvY bundles. 1480% sales increase for a bundled product. -0.8% percentage points of returns after improvements through return analysis.
profile_positions.title: Product Specialist Computer & Games (internship)

volunteer_experiences.role: Ambassador Tilburg University & Sounding board member
volunteer_experiences.description:
• Ambassador Tilburg University: Provided assistance during open days and information evenings on campus by promoting Tilburg University and answering questions of the visitors. Furthermore, give guided tours and hosted possible new students at trial lectures.

• Sounding board member: Co-responsible for evaluating the (pre-)Master programme and teachers. I did this by establishing myself as a link between students and programme coordinators in order to raise points for improvement and possible innovations. In this way, I interacted with more students and remained knowledgable about the study.

• Responsible for the digital communication channels such as the website and the narrowcasting functions on the televisions. 
• Designed and implemented a 'sponsor tv', so the sponsors were more visable at the soccerclub. 
• Using my ADOBE qualities to make flyers or images that are used in the communication.

•	Organized drone races on Kingsday 2017 for children between 4 - 14 years old
•	Imported drones from China
•	Sold fifteen drones during the day

• Developed digital communication strategy to enhance the visibility and support of the idea to the inhabitans of Spoordonk
• Give advise about how to set-up the new website to communicate clearly
